Title: Requires the division of state police to send renewal notices to holders of a license to carry or possess a pistol or revolver before expiration of such license
Summary: Requires the division of state police to send renewal notices to holders of a license to carry or possess a pistol or revolver at least 90 days before expiration of such license.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to requiring the division of state police to send renewal notices to holders of a license to carry or possess a pistol or revolver before expiration of such license
